Sentencas: A comparative investigation of the Ruddlesden-Popper (R-P) phase Srn+1FenO3n +1 (SFO, n = 1, 2 and 3) series of materials has been explored to determine their applicability as cathodes for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells (H-SOFCs).
Titulo: A comparative study of the R-P phase Srn+1FenO3n+1 (n=1, 2 and 3) cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: With the traditional solid-state reaction method, pure SFO powders were obtained.
Titulo: A comparative study of the R-P phase Srn+1FenO3n+1 (n=1, 2 and 3) cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: As n increases, the composition of perovskite in the material increases gradually, and the proportion of the rock salt layer decreases accordingly.
Titulo: A comparative study of the R-P phase Srn+1FenO3n+1 (n=1, 2 and 3) cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The valence state of iron in the SFOs was analyzed using X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS), and the results were consistent with those estimated by an X-ray absorption fine structure (XAFS) analysis.
Titulo: A comparative study of the R-P phase Srn+1FenO3n+1 (n=1, 2 and 3) cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show that the average valence state of iron is the lowest in SFO2 and the highest in SFO3.
Titulo: A comparative study of the R-P phase Srn+1FenO3n+1 (n=1, 2 and 3) cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Notably, Sr3Fe2O7 (SFO2, n = 2) and Sr4Fe3O10, (SFO3, n = 3) showed better electronic conductivity compared with Sr2FeO4 (SFO1, n = 1), in which SFO2 was the best.
Titulo: A comparative study of the R-P phase Srn+1FenO3n+1 (n=1, 2 and 3) cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Paralleling the conductivity test, the oxygen incorporation kinetics of SFO2 were better than the other two components, as measured by the electricity conductivity relaxation (ECR) method.
Titulo: A comparative study of the R-P phase Srn+1FenO3n+1 (n=1, 2 and 3) cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Single cells with the structure of NiO-BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2O3-delta (NiO-BZCY) anode vertical bar-BZCY electrolyte vertical bar-SFO-5wt.% BZCY cathode were also fabricated and measured from 550 to 700 degrees C.
Titulo: A comparative study of the R-P phase Srn+1FenO3n+1 (n=1, 2 and 3) cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At 700 degrees C, the maximum power density of 703.8 mWcm(-2) was achieved with the SFO2-5wt.%BZCY cathode.
Titulo: A comparative study of the R-P phase Srn+1FenO3n+1 (n=1, 2 and 3) cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In conclusion, SFO2 with two BO6 layers connected with a perovskite-related R-P structure is a promising cathode candidate for H-SOFCs, providing new directions for other R-P phase electrode materials for H-SOFCs.
Titulo: A comparative study of the R-P phase Srn+1FenO3n+1 (n=1, 2 and 3) cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
